author: Edie Gerbracht

review: It's nice to have a remote in some cases, but I've gone back to primarily using my Chromecast since the Fire Stick didn't cast Youtube and Netflix as smoothly from my phone as the Chromecast does. The Fire Stick is excellent if you want to find content through the FireTV interface, but if you're looking to cast YouTube or Netflix or other apps from your phone, I find the Chromecast gives a better user experience.

review: I love the fire stick. Its easy to use (very intuitive), has snappy search results, and great HD picture quality. I gave away both my Roku player and chromecast on the tv where the fire stick, knowing that this is the best to use with Amazon prime. My only complaint now is that I can't get HBOgo yet. I'm a very impatient guy so this waiting is killing me. I know its coming so when it gets here it will be like getting a whole new fire stick to play with. Buy this item. You will not be disappointed.
